content:
Toasted coconut now open

Toasted Coconut is a laid-back, family–friendly outdoor restaurant, located right next to the pool. So feel free to bring a towel, lay out and join us for a great meal! Whether you’re looking for good food, for just the two of you, or sharing some fun in the some with all of your friends – we know you’ll have a great time. Our fun filled menu has a little bit for everyone. Sip on a Toasted Punch while deciding if you want some Dynamite Tacos or a Fictional Burger, you won’ t be disappointed.Great food at the perfect latitude – always a laid back attitude.

View Location
